hero.heading: Split Your Videos with Ease
hero.description: Use our intuitive tool to effortlessly split your videos into shorter clips for sharing or editing.

prompt.heading: Video URL
prompt.placeholder: E.g., Enter the URL of the video you want to split...

examples.heading: Before & After Examples
examples.description: Discover how WaveSpeed can transform your video content by splitting lengthy videos into manageable segments.

items.title: Split Long Videos
items.imageAlt: Example showing a long video split into clips
items.description: Easily create shorter clips from your full-length videos for easier sharing.

items.title: Extract Highlights
items.imageAlt: Example showing highlights extracted from a video
items.description: Focus on key moments by extracting highlights and creating quick edits.

features.heading: Why Choose WaveSpeed AI?
features.description: Our top-notch technology ensures quick and seamless video editing.

items.title: Fast Processing
items.description: Achieve results in seconds, thanks to our optimized algorithms.

items.title: User-Friendly
items.description: No technical expertise needed. Simply upload your video and let us handle the rest.

items.title: Privacy Respecting
items.description: Your videos are processed securely and never leave your device.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three simple steps to split your videos effortlessly

items.title: Upload Video
items.description: Upload your video by dragging and dropping or browsing files. Supported formats include MP4, AVI, and MOV.

items.title: AI Processing
items.description: Our advanced processing algorithms automatically segment your video into desired lengths.

items.title: Download Clips
items.description: Preview your clips and download them in high quality, perfect for sharing or editing.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join countless happy users who enhance their videos with WaveSpeed AI

items.name: Emma Parker
items.comment: I love how quickly I can split my travel videos into memorable highlights. It’s so easy!

items.name: John Smith
items.comment: As a content creator, this tool saves me so much time. Splitting videos has never been simpler.

items.name: Rachel Adams
items.comment: The privacy feature gave me peace of mind. My content remains secure, and the results are fantastic!

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your queries about our Video Splitter feature

items.title: What video formats can I use?
items.description: WaveSpeed's Video Splitter supports various formats including MP4, AVI, and MOV, ensuring compatibility with your files.

items.title: Is it free to use the Video Splitter?
items.description: Yes! Each user receives 30 free credits daily, allowing you to split numerous videos. Additional credits can be earned through surveys and challenges.

items.title: Can I use the split videos commercially?
items.description: Yes! Paid users can use the split videos for any commercial purpose, while free users are confined to personal projects.

items.title: How is my privacy protected?
items.description: All video processing occurs directly in your browser, ensuring that your videos are never uploaded or stored on our servers.

footer.heading: Ready to Split Your Videos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and see how easy it is to enhance your video content. No sign-up needed.
